name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing scalable, reliable, and secure high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Node.js**, integrating **GraphQL**, and managing databases with **PostgreSQL**. Demonstrated expertise in Test-Driven Development (TDD), ensuring robust and maintainable code.
Skilled in deploying applications on **AWS** and implementing effective cloud strategies, while focusing on scalability and reliability. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, complemented by hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.
Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing, with a solid foundation in compliance-focused development, aligning solutions with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Adept in MLOps practices utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and maintained backend systems with **Node.js**, ensuring high **scalability** and **reliability** in applications that process over **100,000** user requests per day.
• Designed GraphQL APIs for seamless data interaction, effectively handling over **1 million** queries monthly to optimize data retrieval.
• Implemented robust **PostgreSQL** databases, achieving a **99.9%** uptime and designing schemas to accommodate complex data models while ensuring security compliance.
• Championed **Test-Driven Development (TDD)** practices, reducing bug rates by **30%** in production through rigorous unit and integration testing.
• Leveraged **AWS** cloud services for deploying applications in a fault-tolerant architecture, resulting in cost savings of **25%** due to efficient resource scaling.
• Architected solutions supporting high **security** standards to comply with regulations such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, conducting regular audits and implementing necessary enhancements.
• Enhanced analytical capabilities, implementing tools for monitoring system performance and user behavior, leading to improved decision-making processes.
• Demonstrated strong **problem-solving skills** by addressing complex issues encountered during deployments, ensuring timely resolutions that minimized downtime.

Utilized **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) to modernize core financial platforms, facilitating scalability and performance improvements in high-volume transactional systems.
Employed **PostgreSQL** for database management to ensure reliability and efficiency in data storage.
Implemented **GraphQL** for efficient data querying, enhancing the speed and flexibility of data retrieval for applications.
Promoted **Test-Driven Development** (TDD) practices to guarantee code quality and reduce bugs by over **30%** in production environments.
Adopted **AWS** services to enhance the security of deployments, achieving a **99.9%** uptime rate and safeguarding sensitive financial transactions.
Ensured system scalability by building interactive front-end applications with React (18), Vue 3, and Next.js, utilizing TypeScript and Redux Toolkit for responsive design.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka** and **Azure Service Bus**, streamlining communication across workflows for payment processing and compliance.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with React and **D3.js**, providing insights into transactions and detecting anomalies instantly.
Developed ETL pipelines using **Python** and **Apache Airflow** for efficient financial data ingestion from various sources, bolstering analytical capabilities.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, significantly reducing false positives by **25%** through thoughtful feature engineering and model tuning.

Focused on **Scalability** and **Reliability** by designing and optimizing backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) and **PostgreSQL**, achieving latency under **200ms** and availability above **99.9%**.
Applied **Test-Driven Development (TDD)** methodologies to ensure code quality, with **90% test coverage**, reducing bugs in production and enhancing overall project reliability.
Implemented APIs with **GraphQL** to efficiently fetch data, enabling **50%** reduction in payload sizes and improving client-side performance for high-traffic modules including checkout and order management.
Managed cloud infrastructure with **AWS** to ensure scalable deployment and efficient resource management, resulting in a **30%** cost reduction through optimized resource allocation.
Applied **Security** best practices including role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** to safeguard sensitive user data, ensuring compliance with GDPR standards.
Utilized analytical skills to identify performance bottlenecks, employing proactive problem-solving skills to reduce database query times by **40%** through efficient indexing and query optimization.
Engineered features in a highly collaborative environment, participating in architecture discussions and adopting continuous integration practices to streamline deployment pipelines.
